description: Covered in jam, cream, peaches, plums, cherries and raspberries, this easy Eton mess tart is the perfect dessert for summertime entertaining.
name: Easy Eton Mess Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheets frozen puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place 1 sheet of pastry on each tray. Top with a sheet of baking paper, then a second baking tray. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven. Cool.
Meanwhile, place cream, icing sugar mixture and rose essence in a large bowl. Using a whisk, beat until soft peaks form.
Using a small sharp knife, cut peaches and plums in half and remove stones. Then cut peaches into wedges and slice plums.
Spread tarts with jam, leaving a 1cm border. Top with cream, peaches, plums, cherries and raspberries. Arrange meringues over the top. Sprinkle with thyme. Serve drizzled with honey.
